explains: n. 毅力，不屈不挠的精神

sentences.en: He has never stopped trying and showed great perseverance.
sentences.cn: 他从末停止努力，表现出了极大的毅力。

sentences.en: For him to win the game like that is a testament to his perseverance.
sentences.cn: 他能赢得那样的比赛证明了他的毅力。

sentences.en: The only way to improve is through hard work and dogged perseverance.
sentences.cn: 要更上一层楼，唯一的途径就是艰苦奋斗，不屈不挠。
